text: A business enterprise shall be eligible for certification as a veteran-owned business enterprise if the business enterprise:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-141, see notes following § 2-218.02.

DC CODE § 2-218.38

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Meets the definition of a small business enterprise as described in § 2- 218.32;
Is not less than 51% owned and operated by one of more veterans (as defined in 38 U.S.C. § 101(2));
In the case of any publicly owned business, not less than 51% of the stock of which is owned by one or more veterans; and
One or more veterans control the management and daily operations.

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.
